author: alexandair
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [X] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

Changing OPS to PowerShell.
Changing "PowerShell in Windows" to "Windows PowerShell".
Removing a duplicate line "test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Security".
Fixing a bunch of typos.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
I opened #1660 to track the test path update and the unclear sentence. cc @JamesWTruher
The editorial changes LGTM.

title: removing OPS and a duplicate line in testing-guidelines.md
